selectedVerses.text: He lined the walls of the house on the inside with boards of cedar. From the floor of the house to the walls of the ceiling, he covered them on the inside with wood, and he covered the floor of the house with boards of cypress.
The nave he lined with cypress and covered it with fine gold and made palms and chains on it.
So he lined the house with gold--its beams, its thresholds, its walls, and its doors--and he carved cherubim on the walls.
